TBTreatment 0..*BaseTB Treatment
executionDate 0..1date
treatmentRegimen 0..1codeTB CS - Treatment regimen
Binding: TB CS - Treatment category value set (required)

Binding: TB CS - Resistance Classification value set (required)

outcomeDue 0..1dateTB CS - Outcome due date
